description.en: A story full of laughter and excitement created by Akuu Abao, a teacher who holds an educational license specializing in the Gundam Department's Zeon War of Independence! What is "Otaku"? What is "living with a hobby"? What is an "Ortega Hammer"? Is "Miyamu" the "Mirai Yashima Exclusive Gundam"? What are the “three must-have scenes for independent animation”? "I don't need two beam sabers"? What is the "Screaming Zeon Society"? Is "Sakura Wars" "Tokimeki Sieg Zeon"? Yasuyuki Tokumitsu takes on the challenge again after being the most crazy professional wrestling fan, "The stormy emotions of a way of life that is passionate about something"! Nobaku Otaku Sensei main story episodes 0 to 15, Sakura Wars chasing diary October 18, 1999 Sakura Project 2000 presentation to July 28, 2000 Kayo Show 4 Arabian Rose first day, complete Kodansha version Volume 1 Recording! moreover! As a special appendix for the e-book version, a report manga not included in the book, "Assault on the Bandai Hobby Center !!", which was published in Magazine Z, was not included in the book for some reason. Includes a complete correct prediction trailer! Total number of pages, 239! Please take a look! "Is there a wonder there?" "Oh! There is a wonder here!"
